title: Italian bread salad with sweet pepper and tuna
ingredients: ['150g sliced white bread', '4 tablespoons white vinegar', '8 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon freshly chopped thyme', '1 red onion, sliced into thin rings', '1 green pepper - halved, seeded and sliced into thin strips', '300g tomatoes - peeled, cored and cubed', '1/2 courgette, sliced into thin strips', '1 orange, cubed', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '150g tinned tuna, drained', '2 tablespoons capers', '1/2 bunch fresh basil, sliced']
